alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:58AM CDT until March 27 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Current River near Doniphan. .Moderate flooding continues along the Current River near Doniphan. Water levels continue to rise, and the river is forecast to crest at 19.5 feet later today. The river will then begin a quick fall, dropping below flood stage late Monday morning. For the Current River...including Doniphan...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Doniphan. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water begins to flood homes in Doniphan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
